EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify opportunity owner that estimated close date is 90 days out
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity: Deal Closing in 90 days
EmailTemplate.subject: Your opportunity is estimated to close in less than 90 days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The following opportunity is expected to close in 0-90 days: Opportunity Name: {!Opportunity.Name} Account: {!Opportunity.Account} Stage: {!Opportunity.StageName} Estimated Close Date: {!Opportunity.CloseDate} Detail Link: {!Opportunity.Link}
IMPORTANT NOTE: Make sure you are logged to Salesforce.com (http://crm.ryder.com) before clicking on the opportunity link, then review your opportunity and take appropriate action.
If you click on the opportunity link before logging to Salesforce.com, you will be taken to the standard Salesforce.com login page and you won't be able to log in from there.
Kind Regards Sales Admin
